ch.iserver.ace.net.discovery
Interface DiscoveryCallbackAdapter

public interface DiscoveryCallbackAdapter

Interface between Bonjour related classes and the network layer. All callback events received from the DNSSD are passed via this interface. Therefore the events can be channelized and collected in a central class.

Note: The implementation of this interface is responsible for proper synchronization.

Method Summary
 void setDiscoveryCallback(DiscoveryCallback forward)
          Sets the discovery callback for this adapter.
 void userAddressResolved(String serviceName, InetAddress address)
          Notifies the callback that the address of a user was resolved.
 void userDiscarded(String serviceName)
          Notifies the adapter that a user was discarded.
 void userDiscovered(String serviceName, String username, String userId, int port)
          Notifies the adapter that a new user was discovered by DNSSD.
 void userNameChanged(String serviceName, String userName)
          Notifies the adapter that a user name changed.
 

Method Detail

setDiscoveryCallback

void setDiscoveryCallback(DiscoveryCallback forward)
Sets the discovery callback for this adapter. All events are forwarded to the discovery callback.

Parameters:
forward - the discovery callback to set

userDiscovered

void userDiscovered(String serviceName,
                    String username,
                    String userId,
                    int port)
Notifies the adapter that a new user was discovered by DNSSD.

Parameters:
serviceName - the name of the discovered service
username - the name of the discovered user
userId - the user id
port - the port of the discovered service

userDiscarded

void userDiscarded(String serviceName)
Notifies the adapter that a user was discarded.

Parameters:
serviceName - the service name of the discovered user

userNameChanged

void userNameChanged(String serviceName,
                     String userName)
Notifies the adapter that a user name changed.

Parameters:
serviceName - the service name of the user
userName - the new name of the user

userAddressResolved

void userAddressResolved(String serviceName,
                         InetAddress address)
Notifies the callback that the address of a user was resolved.

Parameters:
serviceName - the service name of the user
address - the address of the user
